thread.title: Sanders Forces Lose Vote As DNC Elects Perez As Chairman
thread.title_full: Sanders Forces Lose Vote As DNC Elects Perez As Chairman

title: Sanders Forces Lose Vote As DNC Elects Perez As Chairman

organizations.name: sanders forces lose vote as dnc

text:
Grassroots Democrats were defeated Saturday as former Labor Secretary Tom Perez was elected chair of the Democratic National Committee.
Perez, an Obama administration appointee and among those on the short list of vice presidential candidates considered by Hillary Clinton last fall, defeated Rep. Keith Ellison, D-Minn., on the second ballot in a DNC meeting held in Atlanta.
“With hard work and a hell of a lot of organizing, we will turn this party around,” said Perez.
  Trump’s Nominee For Labor Secretary Withdraws From Consideration CNN Suffers ‘Technical Issue’ After Sanders Makes ‘Fake News’ Remark Cruz: Obamacare’s Shortcomings Fueled Election Of Discontent Obama Labor Secretary Tom Perez elected head of Democratic Party https://t.co/DCxU4zqLyD pic.twitter.com/Uo4FK6cU2n 
— The Hill (@thehill) February 25, 2017 

Ellison had said the party needed to make a major change in order to recover from the 2016 elections in which President Donald Trump defeated Clinton and Republicans maintained control of both houses of Congress.
“We’re in this mess because we lost not one election, but a thousand elections,” Ellison said before the vote. “We gotta go to the grassroots, ya’ll. Unity is essential. We gotta walk out of here with unity.”
 
“If you polled Democrats outside of this room, Keith would win,” said Jeff Weaver, who managed the 2016 campaign of Sen. Bernie Sanders, I-Vt. “Keith’s support is from the people on the street.”
Twitter agreed.
The broken system is still alive and "working" better than ever, apparently. #DNCChair #TomPerez 
— Toria Grace (งಠ_ಠ)ง (@PiXyyRDuust) February 25, 2017 

TomPerez,a killary shill,told her to attack Bernie during 2016. #AltRadicalLeft never learns. #Trump2020 
— Dr.Nancy,ERdept (@hale4jesus) February 25, 2017 

  Country Music Superstar Thanks Fans For Support After Yet Another Family Tragedy   Larry Cohen , the chairman of Sanders’ new organization Our Revolution, said Perez “didn’t win over anyone” who was a Sanders supporter. “If they didn’t win them over in three months of campaigning, why would they be able to win them over the day after tomorrow?” Cohen asked. “That’s what I would be worried about.” Perez had a string of Obama administration veterans supporting him, including former Vice President Joe Biden.
Ellison’s main supporter was Sanders, who was livid when Biden went with Perez.
“Do we stay with a failed status-quo approach or do we go forward with a fundamental restructuring of the Democratic Party?” Sanders said after Biden’s endorsement. “I say we go forward and create a grassroots party which speaks for working people and is prepared to stand up to the top one percent.”
 
What do you think?
